sols_html:
Let

\(S_{N} = \sum_{n=1}^{N}a_{n}\)

be the \(N\)th partial sum. We say that the series \(\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}a_{n}\) converges provided the sequence \(\{S_{N}\}\) converges to a number \(L\).
